revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Mele |model=A2000 |revision=(G) |upc=6954847900044 |asin=B008PBGXWA, B0083UXI1M |est_release_date=06/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=Android media player |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=A10 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F32G08CBACA |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G63DFR-PBC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA, SDHC, |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1) |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8188CUS |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8201CP |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1; |flags=HDMI, VGA, SPDIF, composite AV, SD Card slot, |stock_os=Android;4.0; |802dot11_protocols=bgn |oui_eth=00:CE:39 }} {{TagLine|Android TV Box - FullHD Internet Media Player}} :[http://en.mele.cn/product/product.php?lang=en&class2=53 Product page]
*[http://linux-sunxi.org/Mele_A2000 ''Mele A2000'' on '''linux-sunxi.org'''] ([http://linux-sunxi.org/images/6/68/Mele-a2000-pcb-front.jpg PCB images]) :Mele A2000 - 512MB RAM :Mele A2000G - 1GB RAM
===Specifications=== *Model: Mele A2000G *CPU: [[Allwinner]] A10 @1GHz ARM (Cortex-A8) *RAM: 1GB (DDR3) *Storage: 8GB Built-in Flash Memory (FW included) *External storage: Supports external: :2.5" SATA or USB HDD (up to 1TB), :USB Flash Drive or SD Card (up to 32GB) *WiFi: 802.11 b/g/n, OS: Android 4.0 *Network: 1x FE LAN (RJ45, 10/100Mbps) *Interface: SATA, SD/SDHC, 3x USB, :OPTICAl, LAN, HDMI, VIDEO, VGA *HDMI: V1.4, supports 1080P, 3D video playback *Video codec: HD MPEG 1/2/4, H.264, HD AVC/VC-1, :RM/RMVB, Xvid/DviX 4/5/6, RealVideo 8/9/10, VP6 *Video format: TS/M2TS/TP/TRP/MKV/MP4/MOV/AVI/ :RM/RMVB/WMV/VOB/ASF/FLV/DAT/MPF/MPEG *Audio format: MP3/WMA/WMV/OGG/FLAC/MKV :Subtitle format: SRT/SMI/SSA/ASS *Other features: Software App, MSN, Skype, QQ *Case: Material: Plastic housing, Color: Black
===See also=== *[[Mele A100]](G) *[[Mele A1000]](G) • [http://linux-sunxi.org/Mele_A1000 Mele A1000] *[[Mele A2000G]] *[[Mele A3700]](G) *[[Mele M9]] • [http://linux-sunxi.org/Mele_A1000G_Quad Mele 9 (A1000G Quad)]
